__TOC__

To format a device (such as a usb stick) from the command line, use the following command:  

<pre>
sudo mkfs.vfat /dev/sdXX
</pre>

where sdXX is the device designation, listed via 

<pre>
ls /dev/sd*
</pre>

it is critical to specify the device intended for formatting in order /not/ to lose wanted data.

additionally, one can run 

<pre>
sudo mkfs.ext3 /dev/sdXX
</pre>

to label the device.
